%%{CloudNative_Serverless}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(CloudNative_Serverless) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(CloudNative_DockerImage) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(CloudNative_HelmChart) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(CloudNative_Serverless) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(CloudNative_Serverless) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(CloudNative_Serverless) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(CloudNative_Serverless) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(CloudNative_ServiceMesh) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(CloudNative_ServiceMesh) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
